channel.title: Blogs on Ben Sebastian
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ben Sebastian

item.title: New Site
item.description: Welcome! You’ve somehow stumbled across my site, (probably because I sent you a link). I created this blog as a way to share interesting tidbits I learn and things I’m still learning about. Nothing is quite as good a teacher as having to teach someone else. My plan is to create articles about penetration tools and techniques, cyber-security news, HackTheBox writeups, bug bounty info and whatever else is interesting in the space.
